channel.description: Recent content in Publications on Haowei Xiang

item.title: Comparison of some simple classifiers for MNIST dataset
item.description: The Goal of this post: is to summarize some interesting supervised machine learning approach, which classfify MNIST hand-writen digit dataset. Method: According to the timeline that I have been exposed, subspace learning, logistic regressions, PCA or so called eigenface, SVM and Neuron Networks will be introduced here. Results: It’s natural to expect that complicated model will have lower test error. Here we will see the accuracy is not proportional to the time of training data.
